text: This is a list of cities and towns in the state of Kerala, India with their population. Thiruvananthapuram, also known as Trivandrum, is the capital city of the state of Kerala. The city that has a population of 9.58 lakhs inhabitants is the Biggest and Most densely inhabited Metro City in Kerala. ==List== :Population and area are pertaining to the boundaries defined under the respective municipal corporations/municipalities, not necessarily the actual urban area. {| class="sortable wikitable" style="width: 50%; font-size: 0.90em;" |- !
